DRC Exam Proctoring Form for Instructors

DRC Exam Proctoring Form for Instructors

This form is for Instructors whose student(s) will be taking their exam(s) at the DRC.
Exams WILL NOT be administered without this form.

  • If a student requests to take an exam for this course at the DRC and their name is not listed above: * Required
  • If multiple sections of this course are offered, please provide course CRN.
  • Preferred Method of Contact * Required
  • You may list multiple exam dates by clicking the + symbol to the right of the entry boxes, if you would like the same proctor form to be used all semester.
    Test NumberTest DateHow much time is the class given to complete the exam? 
  • You may list multiple quiz dates by clicking the + symbol to the right of the entry boxes, if you would like the same proctor form to be used all semester.
    Quiz NumberQuiz DateHow much time is the class given to complete this quiz? 
  • When can the student take the test/quiz? * Required

  • Instructions

  • Please select any materials required or allowed for the exam:
  • If a calculator is allowed, please choose which type(s) are allowed: * Required
    If you do not require other students in the class to use a specific calculator, please choose "any calculator" below.
  • Are there any course specific materials required or allowed for this exam? If yes, please specify. (i.e. model kits, formula sheets, reference texts, etc.)
  • Collect all notes when student turns in exam/quiz?
  • How do you want the exam returned? * Required
  • The individual will need to present ID and sign a form confirming receipt.

  • Send Exam

    Please email the exam to accesstesting@uic.edu at your earliest convenience or upload with this form.

    If one proctor form will be used for the entire semester, please skip this section and email exams directly to accesstesting@uic.edu prior to each exam or quiz with the exam/quiz number, as well as course name and number in the subject line.

  • Drop files here or

  • Additional Information

    Please submit the form below. If there are any last minute changes to an exam, please call the DRC Testing Coordinators at (312) 413-4811 or email accesstesting@uic,.edu.
